participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Emma finds solace in her artistic pursuits. She enjoys quiet moments and values deep connections with her family.
participant_1.background: I spent my birthday alone, but I still made it a relaxing and enjoyable day. I feel closer to some of my family members than others. I work in a craft store. I like to design jewelry to relax. I like to eat in my room alone so I prefer to order fast food and have it delivered.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Liam loves to explore new places and meet new people. He has a humorous side and often finds himself in amusing situations due to his laid-back approach to life.
participant_2.background: I drink far too much soda, which is not good for my health. I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake. I’m often late for class. I work at a hotel. I collect souvenirs from my travels.

content.text: Hi, I am looking for a new friend.
Hi there, I am also looking for a new friend.
What do you do for fun?
I like to travel and collect souvenirs from my travels.
That sounds fun. I like to design jewelry.
I have never been good at arts and crafts.
I am not very good at it either, but it is relaxing for me.
What do you do for work?
I work in a craft store.
That sounds like a fun job.
It is, but it can be stressful at times.
I can imagine. I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake.
That sounds interesting.
It is, but I am often late for class.
Why is that?
Because I am usually up late at night working.
That makes sense.
Do you have any siblings?
I have a younger brother and a sister.
Do you feel closer to some of your family members than others?
Yes, I feel closer to my sister than my brother.
Why is that?
Because she is more understanding.
